Episodes.Title: The Moonshine War

Episodes.Title: For Blood or Money
Episodes.Plot: When Rachel's brother-in-law makes a violent escape from a halfway house, Raylan is forced to hunt him down. Boyd entertains a dangerous offer in Harlan.

Episodes.Title: Cottonmouth

Episodes.Title: Blaze of Glory
Episodes.Plot: When a terminally ill ex-con is linked to a bank heist, Art and Raylan must find him before he and his young henchmen can strike again. However, the manhunt is complicated when Winona worries that a hundred-dollar bill she took from an evidence room locker will be traced back to her after it is taken in the robbery.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: M Violence,drug use and sexual references
Episodes.GuestStars: William Ragsdale, Ronnie Gene Blevins, Chris Coy, Conor O'Farrell, Connie Ray, Scott Wilson

Episodes.Title: Save My Love
Episodes.Plot: Winona's blunder could put her behind bars, unless Raylan can weave his way through a federal courthouse locked down over death threats.

Episodes.GuestStars: Stephen Root, Jere Burns, William Ragsdale, Tara Buck, Karen Landry, Rebecca Creskoff

Episodes.Title: Reckoning
Episodes.Plot: A deadly home invasion hits Raylan personally, placing him in a race with Boyd and Arlo to find the killer. Mags is forced to make decisions about her involvement in the Bennett family's criminal activities and the fate of Dickie, who has a deadly plan to absolve himself of responsibility.
Episodes.GuestStars: Margo Martindale, Jeremy Davies, Kaitlyn Dever, David Meunier, Peter Murnik, Kevin Rankin, Richard Speight Jr., Joseph Lyle Taylor, Raymond J. Barry
